# getOauthConfig

Asynchronously fetches and sets the OAuth configuration.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseSignerClient } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Returns

`Promise<OauthConfig>`
A promise that resolves to the OAuth configuration
